bibl.note: 1973-1979. - 1. Archilochus, Epodes. - 2-4. Alcman. - 5. Stesichorus, (Thebaid?).- 6-7. Sappho. - 8. Anonymous, Meropis. - 9-10. Callimachus, Aetia. - 11. Anonymous (Callimachus?), Archebuleans. - 12. Anonymous, The Oyster.
